Author: NurseMaddie
Text: Do you mind if I ask what kind of surgery it is? Iâ€™ve worked in the OR and could maybe give you some insight into how we do things.   The OR is very cold and poses a hypothermia risk to patients under anesthesia. We cover the body everywhere besides the surgical site with dealings to maintain a sterile field.

Author: tigerchik
Text: I don't know what type of surgery you're having, but they won't see most of your body. They'll put drapes over whatever part they're NOT working on. If that helps at all... you will be mostly covered.
